level.heading: Retroactivity of chapter.
level.text: This chapter shall apply retroactively to all items of property which would have been presumed abandoned if this chapter had been in effect as of January 1, 1980.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-160
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 41-101.
